message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's split it 50/50, no hard feelings!
Not bad, but I was thinking more like 60/40 in my favor.
You're getting a good deal, Bob. Don't think you can get a better one!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I can get a better deal
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better than that.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, let's keep negotiating!
You're getting closer, but I think I can get a better deal. Let's try to find a sweet spot.
This is my best offer. Take it or walk away.
I'm willing to compromise again, let's meet in the middle
Alright, let's meet in the middle. It's not the best deal, but it's better than going home empty-handed.
